title: Forbidden Love (feat. Kevin Iso & Katie Nolan)
description:
Kevin Iso and Katie Nolan join The Bonfire! The guys show Kevin a video of a hack voice-comic and Katie Nolan has a story about a stripper's dangerous monkey, which leads to another story of inter-species love. 

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM 

@DanSoder www.DanSoder.com

@BigJayOakerson www.BigJayOakerson.com
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Katie Nolan, Kevin Iso)
